titleStmt.title: The history of the most unfortunate prince King Edward II with choice political observations on him and his unhappy favourites, Gaveston & Spencer, containing several rare passages of those times, not found in other historians / found among the papers of, and (supposed to be) writ by Henry Viscount Faulkland ...
titleStmt.author: Falkland, Henry Cary, Viscount, d. 1633.
Fannant, Edward.

notesStmt.note: Attributed also to Edward Fannant. Cf. Halkett and Laing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
